title: Installation issue: slepc-3.12.0 fails to configure with gcc@9.2.0
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install slepc
==> Error: Conflicting conditional dependencies for spec

	slepc@3.12.0%gcc@9.2.0+arpack~blopex arch=linux-centos7-ivybridge ^blas ^gettext ^lapack ^petsc@3.12:3.12.99 ^pkgconfig@0.9.0: ^python@2.6:2.8,3.4:

Cannot merge constraint

	arpack-ng+mpi

into

	arpack-ng~mpi
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux localhost.localdomain 3.10.0-1062.1.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Sep 13 22:55:44 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	CentOS Linux release 7.7.1908 (Core)
``` 

- `packages.yaml`
packages:
  all:
    compiler: [gcc]
  perl:
    paths:
      perl@5.16.3%gcc@9.2.0: /usr
  dealii:
    variants: +optflags~python

- `compilers.yaml`

compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: centos7
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@4.8.5
    target: x86_64
- compiler:
    environment: 
      append-path:
        LD_LIBRARY_PATH: /usr/local/lib64
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: centos7
    paths:
      cc: /usr/local/bin/gcc
      cxx: /usr/local/bin/g++
      f77: /usr/local/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/local/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@9.2.0
    target: x86_64

### Additional information

```console
$ less  /tmp/deal.ii/spack-stage/slepc-3.12.0-5md6u45rynyaqtcta4e5dmecqhkp2jkr/spack-src/installed-arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/slepc/conf/configure.log

PETSc install directory: /home/deal.ii/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-ivybridge/gcc-9.2.0/petsc-3.12.0-7b3mdm63ap32riorneym2mtcmwjlb63s

KSPCreate(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,&k);

}

collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
gmake: *** [checklink] Error 1

ERROR: Unable to link with PETSc
```
